DOC.brief_summary: This study explores the effect of a four-hour ultrasound course on physicians' point-of-care ultrasound performance on patients representing acute abdominal surgical conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Transfer From a Point-of-care Ultrasound Course
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized controlled trial with physicians was conducted. The intervention group participated in a four-hour abdominal POC US course before performing ultrasound on four patients with different abdominal surgical conditions. The control group did not participate in a course before performing ultrasound on the patients.
DOC.criteria: Medical Doctor Signed up for a courses in abdominal pointofcare ultrasound
